links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 627
maple: spec := [S,{S=Sequence(Prod(Z,Z,Z,Sequence(Prod(Z,Z))))},labeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20);restart: G(x):=(1-x-x^2)/(-1+x^2+x^3): f[0]:=G(x): for n from 1 to 30 do f[n]:=diff(f[n-1],x) od: x:=0: seq(f[n]/n,n=1..20);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 27 2009]
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
